forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. Widespread frost likely. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. Widespread frost likely. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Scattered frost possible. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Scattered frost possible. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 10C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 50F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Scattered frost possible. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Scattered frost possible. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 9C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 47F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low -1C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 30F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High near 50F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
